sentences.sContent: the products that are currently available
He is currently working on his first novel.
sentences.sCn: 他目前正在创作他的第一本小说。

sentences.sContent: ...I am currently owning a used bicycle for sale...
...I am currently questioning what kind are the most taxing and ultimately beneficial...
...currently many youngsters fancy the western-style wedding...
...For these reasons I think physical books will have a longer existence as a commercial product than some currently predict...
...as currently nuclear electricity accounts for only 2 percent of the national gross electricity generation...
...Perhaps the most profound changes will come when the five billion people worldwide who currently lack Internet access get online...
...The pledge is currently worth about $ 150 billion...
...or than many other nations currently offer...
...And it's true that there are currently more people applying for each available job opening...

words.tran: 现在的；流通的，通用的；最近的；草写的
